message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $9,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product. I hope this aligns with your valuation.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value to me is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I really appreciate it. However, based on my financial situation, I can only afford to pay $8,800 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
